pages.text: Suburban areas are comprised of smaller low-rise buildings.$(br2)This list goes into further detail about certain buildings from specific Rider series.

pages.title: Cous Coussier
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider OOO (2010, TV show)$(br2)Loot:$(li)1 $(l:misc/items/music_discs#anything_goes_music_disc)Anything Goes! Music Disc$(/l) (in a chest)

pages.title: Fantastic Bookstore Kamiyama
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Saber (2020, TV show)$(br2)Loot:$(li)1 $(l:misc/items/music_discs#almighty_music_disc)ALMIGHTY ~ Kamen no Yakusoku Music Disc$(/l), 1 $(l:saber/items/wonder_story)Wonder Story$(/l) (on display)$(li)1 $(l:saber/arsenal/book_gate_wonder_ride_book)Book Gate Wonder Ride Book$(/l) (in a "hidden" doorway)
